reviews.review: It lived up to expectations and the hype... might be the best comic book movie of all time
So confusing, I love the other Avenger movies and all of the Marvel cinematic universe ones but this one let me down.
Phenomenal just a very good movie not as good as endgame but good.

Most likely the best MCU movie in terms of direction and cinematography. The story is very well crafted. The most interesting character is actually the villain, and his journey is the highlight of the movie.

Avengers: Infinity War lives up to the hype, and delivers the action, humour and character interactions that we've been anticipating. Not only does the film deliver on its heroes, but it also introduces the greatest villain in the entire Marvel Cinematic Universe. Thanos is really the main character in this film, and his motivations are clearly established. The struggles and consequences that he goes through are also apparent and clearly defined. Overall, Avengers: Infinity War is one of the greatest MCU films of all time, and one of the greatest superhero films of all time.
Not as good as endgame but still awesome
I really enjoyed this one! A bit long, but had lots of action and intensity.

Avengers : Infinity War 3D (7.5) is visually spectacular and its plot is quite engaging given its 150 minute length. The gathering together of such a huge amount of big names is worth the watch in itself. Josh Brolin (Thanos) and Dave Bautista (Drax) shine in particular, whilst Peter Dinklage's character is an epic fail. On an important side-note, Spider-Man's (Tom Holland's) hair is thoroughly magnificent. Overall Verdict : Very Good
If you like the Marvel super hero movies up to this point, this movie is definitely a must see!

Avengers infinity war somehow manages to perfectly bring together a large ensemble of character to create the most ambitious crossover in Cinematic History. There is no doubt that this is one of the most Comic book feeling films ever made but it is also incredibly well placed, with  a great plot that keeps you on the edge of your seat
